articles.title: Michael Bloomberg Is Open to Spending $1 Billion to Defeat Trump

articles.title: Professor Fired After Joking That Iran Should Pick U.S. Sites to Bomb

After his suspension, Mr. Phansey said in a statement that he regretted his bad attempt at humor.

articles.title: Sultan Qaboos, Who Built Oman Into a Prosperous Oasis of Peacemaking, Dies at 79
